title.narrative: ACCESS TO EDUCATION

description.narrative: More girls and boys, including the most marginalized benefit from increased national, sub-national and community capacity to access and complete preschool and basic education, and transition to further education, which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Access To Quality Learning Opportunities (Covid), Early Learning, Education â€“ General, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement, Operations Support To Programme Delivery. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: All children have improved access to quality inclusive education, from early learning to secondary education, particularly those who are most marginalized

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: More girls and boys, including the most marginalized benefit from increased national, sub-national and community capacity to accessand complete preschool and basic education, and transition to further education

description.narrative: In 2021, UNICEF focused its efforts on ensuring all children and adolescents continue to have access to learning opportunities during pandemic by investing efforts and resources in building the capacity of the government to respond to potential school closures and developing digital resources for access to and quality of education. UNICEF effectively advocated at high-level forums for modernization of the education system through provision of IT equipment and efficient technological solutions for better and continuous access to learning opportunities, UNICEF continued to support the Ministry of Education and Science in developing policies and mechanisms to ensure equitable access to education. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:20/01/2022
